recipe_name: Spicy beans on toast with tomato and basil garnish
author: James Tanner
method: Heat the oil in a frying pan and gently fry the onion and chilli flakes for 1-2 minutes, or until softened, then add the vegetarian bacon. Fry for 3-4 minutes, or until golden-brown and crisp.  Add the tomatoes and baked beans and cook for 2-3 minutes to warm through.  Serve the beans and bacon on a slice of toast, with slices of tomato and cheddar on top, garnished with fresh basil.
ingredients: 2 tbsp olive oil,  ¼ onion, finely chopped,  pinch chilli flakes,  2 rashers vegetarian bacon, chopped,  2 tomatoes, seeds removed and chopped,  ½ tinned baked beans, sieved,  1 slice white toast,  ½ tomato, sliced,  25g/1oz grated cheddar,  5 fresh basil leaves, torn
